meanings.sent1: The fluted vase had lines running down its sides.
meanings.sent2: The fluted pattern on the fabric added texture to the design.
meanings.sent3: The fluted edges of the pie crust made it look fancy.
meanings.sent4: The fluted sand dunes stretched across the desert like giant waves frozen in time.
meanings.sent5: The fluted surface of the rock provided a natural grip for climbing.

meanings.definition: A type of column with grooves
meanings.sent1: The ancient temple featured majestic fluted columns.
meanings.sent2: The architect chose to use fluted columns to enhance the building's grandeur.
meanings.sent3: The fluted columns looked like giant straws holding up the roof.
meanings.sent4: The fluted columns stood tall like guardians at the entrance.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight cast shadows along the fluted grooves of the columns.

meanings.definition: A type of pastry with a wavy edge
meanings.sent1: The bakery displayed a variety of fluted pastries in the window.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the fluted edges of the tart, which added a decorative touch.
meanings.sent3: The fluted pastry reminded him of a frilly skirt twirling in the wind.
meanings.sent4: The fluted crust of the pie resembled delicate lace.
meanings.sent5: The sweet aroma of the fluted pastry filled the kitchen.
